inclusion.criterion: Adult hemodialysis patients treated thrice weekly at Shaare Zedek Medical Center Dialysis Unit.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Men and women will qualify for the study if they were on hemodialysis therapy for more than 3 months, have an average predialysis plasma potassium concentration less than 5.6 mEq/L at the time of enrollment and have nil or minimal urine output (<500 mL/24 h).
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: All participating women of childbearing age will have a negative pregnancy test result before entering into the study.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: known allergy to Spironolactone or Eplerenone
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: hypotension, defined as a predialysis systolic blood pressure less than 100 mm Hg
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: severe hypertension (predialysis systolic blood pressure >180 mm Hg and/or diastolic blood pressure >100 mm Hg)
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has profuse watery diarrhea without odor, V. cholerae was seen in dark-field microscopy of a fresh stool specimen.
